description.value: A set of codes that define a patients pregnancy estimated delivery date. Selected from the SNOMED CT UK coding system: - DescendantOrSelfOf 77386006 | Pregnancy - 60001007 | Not pregnant - 1382571000000100 | Pregnancy status unknown - 152231000119106 | Pregnancy not yet confirmed
